alert.note: Alert for Anchorage; Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 7:19AM AKDT until October 15 at 11:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation occurring. Snow accumulations up to 0.5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Anchorage and Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light wintry mix continues to fall this morning throughout much of the Anchorage Bowl and the Susitna Valley with temperatures hovering in the low to mid 30s. Some isolated areas particularly the Willow area are hovering in the upper 20s. This is causing for any wintry precipitation to stick on contact with the surface. The light wintry mix is expected to end from southeast to northwest around 11 am this morning with the remainder of the day remaining dry.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
